name: The Deepest Forest
description:
The deepest forest is a  first person shooter action horror game. You are driving in the forest but your truck fail, weird noises advising you that is very dangerous stay  there.

For now is not important what is happening, first you need to survive.

Take your shotgun and try to escape.

The game still in development, test where made with a  gtx 1660 s graphic card and ryzen 5 3600, SO windows 10, you need 633 Megas to store.

Game is in a zip folder once unpackage just execute TheDeepestForest.exe
